00062 inline const float* random_colour()
00063 {
00064     static float colour[4];
00065     
00066     colour[0] = randval(1.0f);
00067     colour[1] = randval(1.0f);
00068     colour[2] = randval(1.0f);
00069     colour[3] = randval(1.0f);
00070     
00071     return colour;
00072 }
